title: Conduct Document Review for Relevance
description: A paralegal is assigned a batch of 1,000 documents in an e-discovery platform and must code them for relevance to the case.

tasks.description: Open the assigned batch of documents in the e-discovery tool.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully accesses the document batch.

tasks.description: For each document, read its content and determine if it is responsive to the litigation's discovery requests.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent makes a relevance determination for each document.

tasks.description: Apply the appropriate tag ('Responsive' or 'Not Responsive') to each document in the batch.
tasks.expected_outcome: All documents in the batch are correctly coded.
